In this article we will introduce the pipeline being used for processing the data. Through this article we will be introducing different . 

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
    # dev.args = list(png = list(type = "cairo")),
  dpi=900,
  out.width = "100%",
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE
)

library(xfun)

format_table <- function(mydf){
  mydf %>% 
    kableExtra::kbl() %>% 
    kable_paper() %>% 
    scroll_box(width = "700px", height = "200px")
}

```

First step is to load Chevreul and all other packages required 

```{r setup, }
library(chevreul)
library(Seurat)
library(tidyverse)
```
